sentences.en: A mole or blemish present on the skin from birth; a nevus.
sentences.cn: 胎记出生时皮肤上就有的痣或斑点; 痣.

sentences.en: All cases were diagnosed as junctional nevus or compound nevus in histopathology.
sentences.cn: 其病理组织学上均确诊为痣细胞痣.

sentences.en: Methods 38 cases of large scar and giant nevus were treated with full-thickness skin grafts harvested from expanded flaps.
sentences.cn: 方法：利用扩张皮瓣取大面积全厚皮片游离移植治疗大面积体表瘢痕、巨痣等38例次。

sentences.en: Objective : To investigate the excision technique of pigmented nevus at palpebral margin.
sentences.cn: 目的: 研究可达较好的美学效果的睑缘痣切除方法.

sentences.en: Objective To approach clinical efficacy of pigmented nevus treated by CO _ 2 laser.
sentences.cn: 目的:探讨二氧化碳激光治疗颜面部黑色素痣的临床疗效.

sentences.en: Objective: to observe the treatment effect on nevus flammeus with copper vapor laser photodynamic therapy ( PDT ) .
sentences.cn: 目的: 观察铜蒸汽激光用于光动力疗法对鲜红斑 痣 的治疗效果.

sentences.en: Objective: To sieve out the best methods for nevus treatment.
sentences.cn: 目的：筛选皮肤色素痣的最佳治疗方法。

sentences.en: Rare cases of Becker's nevus in middle age have also been noted.
sentences.cn: 罕见的案件贝克痣在中年,也有人指出.

sentences.en: Similarly, any pigment nevus that is chronically irritated should be excised.
sentences.cn: 同样, 凡是经常受慢性刺激的各种色素痣切勿予以切除.

sentences.en: The blue nevus and Mongolian spots are examples of this light dispersion effect.
sentences.cn: 蓝痣和蒙古斑就是这种光散射效应的例子。

sentences.en: The effective rate were 84.38 % ? 71.05 % and 45.00 % for hemangioma, nevus of Ota and caf é - au - laIt'spots respectively.
sentences.cn: 血管瘤、太田痣和咖啡斑有效率分别为84.38%、71.05%及45.00%.

sentences.en: The relationship between vitiligo and congenital nevus needs to be further elucidated.
sentences.cn: 白癜风合并先天性色素痣这一现象值得进一步研究.

sentences.en: This excision of skin demonstrates a malignant melanoma, which is much larger and more irregular nevus.
sentences.cn: 下面的巨大肿瘤块压迫肾实质,使其发生了扭曲变形.恶性肿瘤切面的颜色多样,可以是黄、白 、 红、棕之间的颜色.

trans.tran_en: any congenital growth or pigmented blemish on the skin; birthmark or mole
